verses.verse: For the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> since it <S%G2192>has<s%> [only] a <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%> [and] not the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G1504>form<s%> of <S%G4229>things,<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> by the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> by <S%G1763>year,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1336>continually,<s%> <S%G5048>make<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G4334>near.<s%>

<S%G1893>Otherwise,<s%> would they not have <S%G3973>ceased<s%> to be <S%G4374>offered,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> the <S%G3000>worshipers,<s%> having <S%G530>once<s%> been <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> would <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4893>consciousness<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>?
But in <S%G846>those<s%> [sacrifices] there is a <S%G364>reminder<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> by <S%G1763>year.<s%>
For it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5022>bulls<s%> and <S%G5131>goats<s%> to <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> when He <S%G1525>comes<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> He <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2378>"Sacrifice<s%> and <S%G4376>offering<s%> Thou hast not <S%G2309>desired,<s%> But a <S%G4983>body<s%> Thou hast <S%G2675>prepared<s%> for Me;
In <S%G3646>whole<s%> <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and [sacrifices] for <S%G266>sin<s%> Thou hast <S%G2106>taken<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> I <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I <S%G2240>have<s%> <S%G2240>come<s%> (In the <S%G2777>roll<s%> of the <S%G975>book<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of Me) To <S%G4160>do<s%> Thy <S%G2307>will,<s%> O <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

After <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G511>above,<s%> <S%G2378>"Sacrifices<s%> and <S%G4376>offerings<s%> and <S%G3646>whole<s%> <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and [sacrifices] for <S%G266>sin<s%> Thou hast not <S%G2309>desired,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> hast Thou <S%G2106>taken<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> [in them]" <S%G3748>(which<s%> are <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law<s%>),

<S%G5119>then<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I <S%G2240>have<s%> <S%G2240>come<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> Thy <S%G2307>will.<s%>" He <S%G337>takes<s%> <S%G337>away<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> the <S%G1208>second.<s%>

By <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> we have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4376>offering<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G2178>all.<s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3008>ministering<s%> and <S%G4374>offering<s%> <S%G4178>time<s%> <S%G4178>after<s%> <S%G4178>time<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G4014>take<s%> <S%G4014>away<s%> <S%G266>sins;<s%>

but He, having <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> for <S%G266>sins<s%> for <S%G1336>all<s%> <S%G1336>time,<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> at the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G1551>waiting<s%> from that <S%G3062>time<s%> <S%G3062>onward<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> His <S%G2190>enemies<s%> be <S%G5087>made<s%> a <S%G5286>footstool<s%> for His <S%G4228>feet.<s%>
For by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4376>offering<s%> He has <S%G5048>perfected<s%> for <S%G1336>all<s%> <S%G1336>time<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
And the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to us; for <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> that I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with them <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> I will <S%G1325>put<s%> My <S%G3551>laws<s%> upon their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> And upon their <S%G1271>mind<s%> I will <S%G1924>write<s%> them," [He then says],
"And their <S%G266>sins<s%> and their <S%G458>lawless<s%> <S%G458>deeds<s%> I will <S%G3403>remember<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> there is <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> there is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> [any] <S%G4376>offering<s%> for <S%G266>sin.<s%>

Since <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> to <S%G1529>enter<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>
by a <S%G4372>new<s%> and <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G1457>inaugurated<s%> for us <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2665>veil,<s%> that is, His <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>
and since [we have] a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

let us <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G4334>near<s%> with a <S%G228>sincere<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> in <S%G4136>full<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> having our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> [clean] from an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> and our <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G3068>washed<s%> with <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G5204>water.<s%>
Let us <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G3671>confession<s%> of our <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G186>without<s%> <S%G186>wavering,<s%> for He who <S%G1861>promised<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful;<s%>
and let us <S%G2657>consider<s%> how to <S%G3948>stimulate<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> to <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deeds,<s%>

not <S%G1459>forsaking<s%> our <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1997>assembling<s%> <S%G1997>together,<s%> as is the <S%G1485>habit<s%> of <S%G5100>some,<s%> but <S%G3870>encouraging<s%> [one another]; and <S%G5118>all<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> as you <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1448>drawing<s%> <S%G1448>near.<s%>

For if we go on <S%G264>sinning<s%> <S%G1596>willfully<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G2983>receiving<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> there <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G620>remains<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> for <S%G266>sins,<s%>

but a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5398>terrifying<s%> <S%G1561>expectation<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> and the <S%G2205>fury<s%> of a <S%G4442>fire<s%> which <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2068>consume<s%> the <S%G5227>adversaries.<s%>

<S%G5100>Anyone<s%> who has <S%G114>set<s%> <S%G114>aside<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3628>mercy<s%> on [the testimony of] <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

<S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G5501>severer<s%> <S%G5098>punishment<s%> do you <S%G1380>think<s%> he will <S%G515>deserve<s%> who has <S%G2662>trampled<s%> <S%G2662>under<s%> <S%G2662>foot<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and has <S%G2233>regarded<s%> as <S%G2839>unclean<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> and has <S%G1796>insulted<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%>?

For we <S%G3609>know<s%> Him who <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1557>"Vengeance<s%> is <S%G1699>Mine,<s%> I will <S%G467>repay.<s%>" And <S%G3825>again,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> His <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
It is a <S%G5398>terrifying<s%> <S%G5398>thing<s%> to <S%G1706>fall<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G363>remember<s%> the <S%G4387>former<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G1722>when,<s%> <S%G3739><s%> after being <S%G5461>enlightened,<s%> you <S%G5278>endured<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G119>conflict<s%> of <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%>

<S%G3778>partly,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> by being <S%G2301>made<s%> a <S%G2301>public<s%> <S%G2301>spectacle<s%> through <S%G3680>reproaches<s%> and <S%G2347>tribulations,<s%> and <S%G1161>partly<s%> by <S%G1096>becoming<s%> <S%G2844>sharers<s%> with <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G390>treated.<s%>

For you <S%G4834>showed<s%> <S%G4834>sympathy<s%> to the <S%G1198>prisoners,<s%> and <S%G4327>accepted<s%> <S%G5479>joyfully<s%> the <S%G724>seizure<s%> of your <S%G5225>property,<s%> <S%G1097>knowing<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G5223>possession<s%> and an <S%G3306>abiding<s%> one.
<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> do not <S%G577>throw<s%> <S%G577>away<s%> your <S%G3954>confidence,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3405>reward.<s%>

For you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G5281>endurance,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that when you have <S%G4160>done<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you may <S%G2865>receive<s%> <S%G1860>what<s%> was <S%G1860>promised.<s%>
For <S%G2089>yet<s%> in a <S%G3745>very<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3745>while,<s%> He who is <S%G2064>coming<s%> will <S%G2240>come,<s%> and will not <S%G5549>delay.<s%>

But My <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>one<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith;<s%> And <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G5288>shrinks<s%> <S%G5288>back,<s%> My <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2106>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> in him.
But we are not of those who <S%G5289>shrink<s%> <S%G5289>back<s%> to <S%G684>destruction,<s%> but of those who have <S%G4102>faith<s%> to the <S%G4047>preserving<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul.<s%>
